firstTime.scenario: OMG, I'm having this amazing tuna poke bowl with avocado, edamame, and spicy mayo! It's like, so fresh and Instagram-perfect!

option1Wine.feedbackText: Perfect! You nailed the fresh, clean pairing!

option2Wine.feedbackText: Good choice! But Sauvignon Blanc would be even better.

option3Wine.feedbackText: Not quite! Red wine would overwhelm the delicate tuna.

firstTime.scenario: I'm obsessed with this burrata and peach salad with arugula and balsamic glaze! Sweet, creamy, peppery—it's like flavor goals!

option1Wine.feedbackText: Totally! Rosé's fresh fruitiness complements the peaches perfectly!

option2Wine.feedbackText: Good with the burrata, but might be too heavy for the peaches.

option3Wine.feedbackText: Way too intense! This delicate salad needs something lighter.

firstTime.scenario: I'm totally loving this Korean BBQ beef with kimchi and jasmine rice! It's spicy, funky, and so addictive!

option1Wine.feedbackText: Yes! Syrah's bold character stands up to the Korean BBQ perfectly!

option2Wine.feedbackText: Decent with the beef, but might lack intensity for the kimchi.

option3Wine.feedbackText: Too delicate! This bold, spicy dish needs a stronger wine.

remedial.scenario: I'm having this cute little salmon tartare with cucumber and citrus! So fresh and aesthetic!

option1Wine.feedbackText: Perfect! Crisp and fresh, just like the tartare!

option2Wine.feedbackText: No way! Red wine would totally clash with the delicate salmon.

remedial.scenario: I'm obsessed with this truffle pasta carbonara! It's like, so rich and luxurious!

option1Wine.feedbackText: Amazing choice! Rich wine for a rich dish!

option2Wine.feedbackText: Too light! This rich carbonara needs a fuller wine.
